title: Histone Marks in the 'Driver's Seat': Functional Roles in Steering the Transcription Cycle.
venue: TIBS -Trends in Biochemical Sciences. Regular ed

tldr.text: New developments describing the ordered, mechanistic role of select histone marks occurring during distinct steps in the RNA polymerase II (Pol II) transcription cycle are discussed.
